name: Project Alpha (Funeral Pyre Games)
description:
Waking up, you find yourself in the middle of nowhere, hearing only an audio log from someone that you don't know. In fact, you don't remember anyone or anything. All you can see is the puzzle in front of you. Armed with the only thing you remember, the knowledge that you need to escape the planet, you resolve to solve that puzzle and begin your escape.

Project Alpha is a roughly 45 minute environmental narrative puzzle game inspired by the likes of Myst, The Witness, and Gone Home. In it, you play an amnesiac character who wakes up on a foreign planet. Your goal is to solve logic, environmental, and story puzzles whilst attempting to both escape and unravel why you are there.

On your way, you'll explore a semi-open world sci-fi landscape as you discover puzzles  around the game world. In addition, as you progress, you'll unlock new chapters of a non-linear audio drama told through 15 logs that explains the game's story.

Do you have what it takes to escape?

Features-
  • A semi-open science fiction world split into 4 areas
  • 40 different puzzles to solve
  • A non-linear audio drama which is fully voice acted and subtitled
  • 45 minutes to 1 hour of gameplay
